00041 #include "pizItemset128.h"

00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00045 
00046 void pizItemset128SetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index)
00047 {
00048     long i, p, m;
00049     
00050     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00051     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00052     
00053     m = 1 << p;
00054     
00055     itemset->items[i] |= m;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index) 
00059 {
00060     long i, p, m;
00061     
00062     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00063     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00064     
00065     m = 1 << p;
00066     
00067     itemset->items[i] &= ~m;
00068 }
00069 
00070 void pizItemset128Clear (PIZItemset128 *itemset)  
00071 {
00072     long i;
00073     
00074     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00075         itemset->items[i] = 0;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 long pizItemset128Count (const PIZItemset128 *itemset)
00080 {
00081     long i;
00082     long k = 0;
00083     
00084     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00085         unsigned long n = itemset->items[i];
00086             
00087         while (n != 0) {
00088             k += (n & 1);
00089             n >>= 1;
00090         }
00091     }
00092     
00093     return k;
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (const PIZItemset128 *itemset, long index) 
00097 {
00098     unsigned long k = 0;
00099 
00100     long i, p;
00101 
00102     i = index / PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00103     p = index % PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_OF_ULONG;
00104     
00105     k = itemset->items[i];
00106 
00107     k >>= p;
00108     k  &= 1;
00109     
00110     return (k != 0);
00111 }
00112 
00113 void pizItemset128Union (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r) 
00114 {
00115     long i;
00116     
00117     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00118         r->items[i] = a->items[i] | b->items[i];
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 void pizItemset128Intersection (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b, PIZItemset128 *r) 
00123 {
00124     long i;
00125     
00126     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00127         r->items[i] = a->items[i] & b->items[i];
00128     }
00129 }
00130 
00131 bool pizItemset128IsIncluded (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b)
00132 {
00133     long i;
00134     bool k = true;
00135             
00136     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00137         if (b->items[i] != (b->items[i] | a->items[i])) {
00138             k = false;
00139             break;
00140         }
00141     }
00142         
00143     return k;
00144 }
00145 
00146 bool pizItemset128IsEqual (const PIZItemset128 *a, const PIZItemset128 *b)
00147 {
00148     long i;
00149     long k = true;
00150             
00151     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE_IN_WORDS; i++) {
00152         if (a->items[i] != b->items[i]) {
00153             k = false;
00154             break;
00155         }
00156     }
00157         
00158     return k;
00159 }
